title: Environment & Nature
part1: What do you do to protect the environment?
Are there any environmental problems in your country?
How can people help to reduce pollution?
What is your opinion on climate change?

part2.cue_card_topic: Describe a natural place you have visited.
cue_card_points: and explain why you liked it.

part3: What are the main causes of environmental problems?
How can governments encourage people to protect the environment?
Do you think technology can help solve environmental issues?
